description: [Status: stable] [Name: not-is-test] [Message: Test for object identity should be is not] What it does Checks for identity comparisons using not {foo} is {bar}. Why is this bad? According to PEP8, testing for an object's identity with is not is more readable. Example if not X is Y: pass Z = not X.B is Y Use instead: if X is not Y: pass Z = X.B is not Y
